bio:
I am a photonics engineer with over 6 years experience designing optical system prototypes. I use Zemax's OpticStudio to theoretically prove out optical systems per customer specifications, then build out and test final products. For final designs I work with either readily available optical component companies or design and spec out custom manufactured devices.

• Work with customers to steer and generate requirements for their products using my extensive knowledge in building and testing optical systems

• Experienced with OpticStudio sequential and non-sequential systems, and using ZOS API to customize user interfaces

• Ability to specify coherent (laser) and incoherent (LED) sources with optical components to generate a specified output for the complete optical system

• Model full optical system in OpticStudio including CAD objects and light sources using manufacturer spec sheets and customer CAD files

• Adept at theoretical calculations for optical systems and creating user interfaces to simplify data generation
Flexible on projects and terms of contract.  Please contact me to discuss.

abstrac: I am at your service, I work for your satisfaction and my reward are your good comments about the job done.
bio:
I was born in Caracas Venezuela in the year 1954. I decided to be an engineer and during the time I was studying y worked half time too. Assisting other engineers, in inspections, the quantity of work done, materials take-off list. Structural drawings were made by me. Some design was done a house and a fire station. After graduating I could build a Church and embraced several field projects. later I was working with the Microsoft project and the Pert-CPM method employed for a large company in Planification, controlling the works time of completion.
Later continued building bridges. I finally ended working for a university as a structures professor where I had to update my knowledge to the latest standards, and construction codes. Used new structure software. From the year 2000, I started AutoCAD making structural drawings. Today I work as a freelancer and I enjoy working at home.

The GMT in Caracas Venezuela is -4:30
I like to start working early in the morning at 5 am, making several stops throughout the day. Do not have a regular schedule anyhow I work until I complete 4 hours
But still, I am late at the computer to about 9 pm making research and studying new material according to my bids posted, and different construction codes updates. when I have a customer work until the job is done to his satisfaction. I like fixed prices with milestones.

bio:
Update 2020: I've been away for several years working as a litigator. After years of exhaustion, I'm cooling my jets to do odd jobs here and there, choosing only the best clients with the most interesting assignments. Despite my photo selections, I am not a cat person or catty. 

I am a lawyer who writes to win. Whether it's a demand letter, assistance with your pro se complaint, or even a business plan, people read what I write. Most times they like it.  

I'm someone who likes smart clients, who know the value of what I offer.  
I work for people who are serious about business, and who are willing to roll up their sleeves with me.  I write to convince the reader, which takes time to accomplish.  My rates are flexible, but you must be serious about your business endeavor.

I work pretty much every day, but like to return to my work, to edit, which means I need a couple of days, preferably 5-7 days to do a good job. I might not bill you for the whole time spent, but I like to mull things over, at times, and return to it.  I am not wealthy, but I have other pursuits, so I choose my clients as much as they choose me. Communication is essential--I use email most of the time. Chances are I'll bother you more than you'll bother me. I keep my clients updated daily in an email.

I've been doing this online for a long time now.  For me, it's the only way to work. I look forward to working with you!

Always work on one principle that nothing ever is Impossible in this world 
because the word itself says I’M POSSIBLE

iQLANCE  is a team of extremely passionate and creative designers, developers and Testers. We strongly believe in culture of developing your passion indulge in your career . we have designers who finds life in your dream  and developers  who actually bring this life into existence .
